system.notes: Retrofits "Main Cargo Hold", -5 Hull and Manoeuvrability. Holds up to 6 squadrons only 2 can be launched at a time. Squadrons have -2 VU on first turn. In combat make +10 Piloting+Manoeuvrability Test to land. 3DoF requires new attempt, 4DoF damages craft. For squadrons, one damaged craft per DoF. Out of Combat, Squadron Landing takes 30mins.
